Docs.summary: Maps the configuration file virtual and physical paths.

remarks.format: ## Remarks IConfigMapPathFactory is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.Configuration.IConfigMapPath Create (string virtualPath, string physicalPath);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.Configuration.IConfigMapPath Create(string virtualPath, string physicalPath) cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates the interface for the mapping between configuration-file virtual and physical paths.
Docs.returns: The object associated with the specified configuration-file path mapping.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Create is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
